footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xinyan | Update Date: 08/15/2022 | Editor: Luanjo#5886

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Greatsword__ has a chance to generate Energy Particles for the entire team whenever the holder hits a CRIT. Xinyan's C2 eliminates the need to build CRIT Rate. Holder needs to be on-field.

__Wolf's Gravestone__ grants an ATK% buff to the entire party whenever the holder hits an opponent under 30% HP. Holder needs to be on-field. Consider how often you'll be able to utilize its passive before picking this one.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: 4-piece Instructor is able to share Elemental Mastery for the entire party, most importantly to Hu Tao or Yoimiya making it Xinyan's best set for buffing. This comes at the cost of a slimmer shield and lower Energy Recharge due to it's 4-star maximum rarity.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xinyan | Update Date: 08/15/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sacrificial Greatsword__
Maximizes uptime. The shield is best considered at Level 3 which can be casted immediately after Bursting or hitting multiple enemies. If the additional Elemental Skill charge is used prematurely, you may lose the stronger shield and gain a weaker one.
__Whiteblind__
Maximizes shieldstrength, but will require strong investment into Energy Recharge. Has enough Defence to allow for an Energy Recharge sands to be run.
